extension_description.message: Password Checkup helps you re-secure accounts that have been affected by data breaches.

extension_detailed_description.message:
Wherever you sign-in, if you enter a username and password that is no longer safe due to appearing in a data breach known to Google, youâ€™ll receive an alert. Please reset your password. If you use the same username and password for any other accounts, please reset your password there as well.

Password Check-Up was built with privacy in mind. It never reports any identifying information about your accounts, passwords or device. We do report anonymous information about the number of look-ups that surface an unsafe credential, whether an alert leads to a password change, and the domain involved for improving site coverage. You can learn more about how Password Check-Up works at https://support.google.com/accounts?p=password-checkup.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at www.google.com/policies/.

popup_default_status_message.message: None of your recently used passwords were detected in a data breach.

popup_ignored_status_message.message: None of your recently used passwords were detected in a data breach. This does not include unsafe passwords where you have opted to ignore resetting.

popup_multiple_accounts_warning_status_m.message: Password Checkup has detected that the following $1 accounts have passwords that are no longer safe due to a data breach.

popup_one_account_warning_status_message.message: Password Checkup has detected that the following 1 account has a password that is no longer safe due to a data breach.

popup_reset_extension_text.message: Clear all extension data. This will remove all stored information about unsafe passwords and previously ignored sites.

popup_warning_action.message: You should change your passwords now.

reset_text.message: You should change your password now.

warning_text.message: Password Checkup has detected that your password for $1 is no longer safe due to a data breach.
